org.xmlcml.euclid
Class Int2

java.lang.Object
  org.xmlcml.euclid.Int2

public class Int2
extends java.lang.Object

A pair of integers with no other assumptions Contains two ints. The default value is 0, 0.

Author:
(C) P. Murray-Rust, 1996
